name: Lesser Terror's Gift of Displacement
description:
Who knows the motives of cosmic horrors? This one however bestows a lone astronaut with a gift to allow them to explore an ancient alien temple.

A puzzle-ish platformer about exploring an alien ruin with a teleportation gun.

Controls

  • Move - WASD / LTS
  • Jump - Space/ A button ( x 2)
  • Shoot - LMB / RT
  • Teleport - RMB / LB
  • Run - Left Shift / X button  (Hold)

As always I had to cut so much due to time, as I originally planned to populate the temple with enemies to shoot as well too. Destroying an enemy would immediately refill your teleportation bar so you could get a chain going or something. I also had planned out a boss that you had to beat with carefully timed teleports too.
Hopefully I can put them in if I have the time after the jam.

Oops I unfortunately fell into the trap of including controller inputs for the game and not for the menus. Slapped myself on the wrist for that one.

I also am aware of a couple of bugs, where the jump height of the astronaut stays low directly after a teleport for a few seconds longer than I originally planned. It resets but it does mean that if you are jumping right after teleporting the jump is weak.

Also there is some kind of tile error on the browser version in one of the sets of two spike balls meaning the astronaut gets stopped as if he has walked into a wall. You can get over it if you jump but its still annoying and can cause you to take damage.

Created by Circumpunk-KKB in Unity
